sentences.en: being in the band isn't a bowl of cherries.
sentences.cn: 作为乐队的一员并不是什么乐事。

sentences.en: Each cake had a cherry on top.
sentences.cn: 每块蛋糕上面都有一颗樱桃.

sentences.en: It's lovely in the spring when the cherry blossom is out.
sentences.cn: 春天樱花开放,十分美丽.

sentences.en: Light filtered into my kitchen through the soft, green shade of the cherry tree.
sentences.cn: 光线透过樱桃树柔和的绿阴隐约照进我的厨房。

sentences.en: Mark and Rick were the odd ones out in claiming to like this cherry beer.
sentences.cn: 只剩下马克和里克声称喜欢喝这种樱桃啤酒。

sentences.en: One's not often got two bites at a cherry in the world of business.
sentences.cn: 在商界,机会一去难再来.

sentences.en: The boy made a switch from the branch of a cherry tree.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩用樱桃树枝做了一条鞭子.

sentences.en: The cabinet is made of cherry wood.
The cherry - trees began to put forth their blossoms.
The cherry blossom came out early in Washington this year.
sentences.cn: 今年华盛顿的樱花开得很早。

sentences.en: The cherry trees cast all their blossoms after the storm.
sentences.cn: 风暴过后,樱花全部落掉.

sentences.en: The club is in debt while others are queuing to cherry-pick their best players.
sentences.cn: 这家俱乐部债台高筑，其他俱乐部则排着队等候挑选它最优秀的球员。

sentences.en: The oriental cherry is in full blossom.
The valley is carpeted with cherry blossoms.
They all went to enjoy the cherry blossoms.
Where are the cherry and bird, the blanket and book? "
sentences.cn: 樱桃、鹅 、 毯子,还有书都在 哪里 ? ”

words.tran_cn: [木][园艺]樱桃；樱桃树；如樱桃的鲜红色；处女膜，处女

phrases.tran_cn: 蛋糕上的樱桃；锦上添花之物

trans.tran_cn: 樱桃，樱桃树，樱桃色，处女膜
trans.tran_en: a small round red or black fruit with a long thin stem and a stone in the middle
